WorkItem.ClosedComment: Issue not related with the toolkit
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

    Can anyone tell me what are the replacements for selectNodes(), selectSingleNode() functions in XrmServiceToolKit. and how to use them in crm 2013.

Comments.Message:
Hi There.

The toolkit use jQuery to read XML and does not use selectNodes(), selectSingleNode() methods.

If you have JavaScript uses those methods, you will need to convert them into cross browser code for CRM 2013.

You can do a search to find several solutions on the web.

Jaimie
